course_description: This course prepares students to provide in-depth diabetes self-management education to patients and their families. Content is based on the American Association of Diabetes Educators (AADE) 7 Self-Care Behaviors theoretical framework.
sections: Class Nbr: 3456, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 1-2:50p, Instructor: E. Ferranti, Status: Open
